fields.value: Central Opera Service Bulletin Performance Listings [1959-1990]

dsDescriptionValue.value:
The Performance Listings of the Central Opera Service Bulletin includes opera performances and workshops held United States nationwide and the world. The Central Opera Service Bulletin was published bi-monthly by the Central Opera Service up to 1989.  Performance listings were retrospectively entered from bulletins published between 1959 and 1989. The Cultural Policy and the
Arts National Data Archive (CPANDA) contracted the entry of the Performance Listings in the Central Opera Service Bulletin published from 1966-1989 into a database. After the information was returned, CPANDA staff checked the entered data by crosschecking randomly selected data against original bulletin entry. The organization names, city, and the state were standardized for consistency. Listed information includes performance organization names, location, opera title, and staff involved in the performances.

Performance listings were retrospectively entered from bulletins published between 1959 and 1989. After the information was returned, CPANDA staff checked the entered data by crosschecking randomly selected data against original bulletin entry. The organization names, city, and the state were standardized for consistency.
Listed information includes performance organization names, location, opera title, and staff involved in the performances.

fields.value: Version Date: 2015-03-19Version Text: 2015-03-19Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: This data collection was previously distributed by the Cultural Policy and the Arts National Data Archive (CPANDA). The CPANDA Identification Number (study number) for the entire data collection is c00022. The CPANDA Identification Number for the 1966-1990 survey is a00238, and for 1959-1965 is a00247. CPANDA conducted the following processing steps for release of this collection: produced a codebook, checked for undocumented codes, performed consistency checks, provided frequencies, performed recodes, and reformatted the data.;Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: Central Opera Service ceased in 1990. Opera America is the successor organization.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: Stata system file(s), rda Data file(s), sav Data file(s), stc Data file(s), tsv Data file(s), Data file(s), xls Data file(s), and electronic documentation.;
